Jersey_City.World Trade Center (2001\u2013present): The World Trade Center is a partially completed complex of buildings in Lower Manhattan, New York City, U.S., replacing the original seven World Trade Center buildings on the same site that were destroyed in the September 11 attacks. The site is being rebuilt with five new skyscrapers, three of which have been completed, a memorial and museum to those killed in the attacks, and a transportation hub. One World Trade Center, the tallest building in the United States and the Western Hemisphere, is the lead building for the new complex, reaching 104 stories upon its completion on November 3, 2014.
